00040 class SIM_API cQueue : public cObject
00041 {
00042   private:
00043     struct QElem
00044     {
00045         cObject *obj;
00046         QElem *prev, *next;
00047     };
00048 
00049   public:
00053     class Iterator
00054     {
00055       private:
00056         QElem *p;
00057 
00058       public:
00064         Iterator(const cQueue& q, bool athead=true)
00065                 {p=&q ? (athead ? q.headp : q.tailp) : NULL;}
00066 
00070         void init(const cQueue& q, bool athead=true)
00071                 {p=&q ? (athead ? q.headp : q.tailp) : NULL;}
00072 
00076         cObject& operator[](int) _OPPDEPRECATED  {return p ? *(p->obj) : *(cObject *)NULL;}
00077 
00081         cObject *operator()()  {return p ? p->obj : NULL;}
00082 
00086         bool end() const   {return (bool)(p==NULL);}
00087 
00093         cObject *operator++(int)  {if (!p) return NULL; cObject *r=p->obj; p=p->next; return r;}
00094 
00100         cObject *operator--(int)  {if (!p) return NULL; cObject *r=p->obj; p=p->prev; return r;}
00101     };
00102 
00103     friend class Iterator;
00104 
00105   private:
00106     bool tkownership;
00107     QElem *headp, *tailp;           // inserting at head, removal at tail
00108     int n;                          // number of items in queue
00109     CompareFunc compare;            // compare function
00110     bool asc;                       // order: true=ascending
00111 
00112   protected:
00113     // internal functions
00114     QElem *find_qelem(cObject *obj) const;
00115     void insbefore_qelem(QElem *p, cObject *obj);
00116     void insafter_qelem(QElem *p, cObject *obj);
00117     cObject *remove_qelem(QElem *p);
00118 
00119   public:
00122 
00128     cQueue(const cQueue& queue);
00129 
00134     explicit cQueue(const char *name=NULL);
00135 
00139     explicit cQueue(const char *name, CompareFunc cmp, bool a=false) _OPPDEPRECATED;
00140 
00144     virtual ~cQueue();
00145 
00153     cQueue& operator=(const cQueue& queue);
00155 
00158 
00164     virtual cPolymorphic *dup() const  {return new cQueue(*this);}
00165 
00170     virtual std::string info() const;
00171 
00176     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00177 
00183     virtual void netPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00184 
00190     virtual void netUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00192 
00195 
00199     virtual void setup(CompareFunc cmp, bool a=false) _OPPDEPRECATED;
00200 
00205     virtual void insert(cObject *obj);
00206 
00212     virtual void insertBefore(cObject *where, cObject *obj);
00213 
00219     virtual void insertAfter(cObject *where, cObject *obj);
00220 
00225     virtual cObject *remove(cObject *obj);
00226 
00231     virtual cObject *pop();
00232 
00236     virtual cObject *getTail() _OPPDEPRECATED {return pop();}
00237 
00242     virtual void clear();
00244 
00247 
00252     virtual cObject *head() const;
00253 
00258     virtual cObject *tail() const;
00259 
00263     virtual int length() const;
00264 
00268     bool empty() const {return length()==0;}
00269 
00274     cObject *get(int i) const;
00275 
00279     virtual bool contains(cObject *obj) const;
00281 
00284 
00290     void takeOwnership(bool tk) {tkownership=tk;}
00291 
00297     bool takeOwnership() const   {return tkownership;}
